body:
when you are the smug bitch and you fished a yandere. and you thought its just a simp but fully awakens and had a life changing plan for you. 
its not just karma. its divine retribution and eternal damnation. "be careful of what toys you play it might be a live IED and you are close to the fire"
Tenno sama, looks what the fuck they do to your ship
"A girl who cannot become a princess has no choice but to become a witch."
It makes me rethink should i have kashima as secretary ship or not in kancolle

For some reason I find this story quite compelling... I wonder if at the end Kashima was crying because she was forced to marry the admiral, or because she regretted what she did and how things turned out. I certainly hope it's the latter, otherwise she could be miserable for the rest of her life :/
When Bad Kashima meet Evil Admiral....nice plot
